summary.para: Encrypts the specified string with the specified key.

remarks.para:
Parameters:
string - The string to encrypt.
string - The key to encrypt the string with.
string - The initialization vector to encrypt the string with.

summary.para: Decrypts the specified string with the specified key.

remarks.para:
Parameters:
byte[] - The bytes to decrypt.
string - The key to decrypt the string with.
string - The initialization vector to decrypt the string with.
